data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Plateau.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Plateau, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Plateau, Nigeria with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 3,553,400 people living in Plateau.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Plateau.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Kadun people.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Plateau, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Plateau
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary:
the state of Plateau, Nigeria has a population of 3,553,400.

We estimate Plateau has 915,441 people who might know Jesus, 904,248 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,733,711 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 915,441 believers in Plateau to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

location.name: Plateau
location.people_groups_list: Jorto, Ake, Kofyar, Jukun, Wase, Yashi
